reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This hotel is a bit of a find I think. Superior bungalow (108) was well furnished had an amazing front row sea view which made it worth ever penny. Clean and spacious and well appointed.
reviews.title: Location Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Set far enough away from the town to be tranquil its beautiful at night apart from the noise from Hippies Bar which carries right across the bay. Pity the managment of the hotel address this with the proprietors as for location and price this is a disappointment. This caused us to change rooms two rows back which was quieter due to the tree screening and the view was still good.
reviews.title: Phi Phi Island resort was fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The beaches in front of the bungalows are great and quiet and a real bonus (didn't really use the pool).
reviews.title: Impressive bungalows! Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The food at the hotel truly is excellent. Breakfast is English/American/Asian so there is something for everyone, there are excellent burgers/sandwiches throughout the day and I would recommend the restaurant for the evening as well and eating on the beach by candelight is a treat.
reviews.title: Pretty resort on beautiful Phi Phi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Returning to Phi Phi I would definitely pick this hotel again. I loved it.
reviews.title: Will be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent there 2 weeks having vacations. Most of all i liked the location. Very quiet territory but if you walk 5min to the villare you can enjoy all the clubs, drinks, massage and other stuff available. The famous long beach is also not so far, maybe 7min walk by the seaside. Some reviewers complain abouy the hills that you have to conquer - you know, it's a matter of age and attitude. I'm 25 and i don't care, it was fun. This hotel is the best compromise of price, location and activities.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Location is convienient but rooms are all uphill on a heavy steep, pool is average nothing unique about it really, the staff arent the smartest of people and to top it off the water went out and was pumping crap through the basins and shower.
reviews.title: Absolute crap...literally!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I personally would not stay again. just find somewhere else they're alot nicer hotels on the beach.
reviews.title: Good hotel with an amazing view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here as part of a package with transfers from Phuket. It is a little bit away from the main area at the end of the beach but this suited us. breakfast was included and included the usual range of buffet options. The best part is of course the view as the resort is right on the beach with the bungalows up the hill. Room was clean, had fridge, kettle and safe. Aircon worked well and bed was comfortable. There were also a couple of sun beds on our balcony. Staff were friendly.
reviews.title: Great Location and view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Again with this hotel I read some very mixed reviews but read that the location was good so decided to give it a go.
reviews.title: Ok resort...that actually is the best way to explain it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have spent some time choosing hotel for 11 nights at Phi Phi, and I believe I've made the right choice. Location is good - far enough from main noise, though just 10 min walk to the main restaurants and shops. View from the room (B113) was excellent. Staff was helpful enough. Breakfast was not fancy, but ok.
reviews.title: Overpriced, though worth it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the negative side:
reviews.title: Good choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1) Overall hotel is overpriced, especially in peak season. Furniture in the room was really dated, no fan in our room, which we really prefer to use in Thai instead of aircon. We have seen fans in some rooms though. Room categories and rates are bad joke. We have paid for "grand deluxe" for 8 nights, and then for 3 nights stayed in the same room as "deluxe", which was considerably cheaper. I understand that those rooms facing the sea and having the best view are considered as grand deluxe though being quite dated, while newer rooms are being sold cheaper. I have no complains though cause for us great view and location much more valuable than poor facilities.
reviews.title: Great location and price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2) They charge 2500 THB per person for NY eve dinner, which is compulsory. Considering quality of food, drinks and show this is pure robbery. Our waiter offered us some drinks claiming they are free, and brought us extra bill afterwards. Quite disappointing.
reviews.title: Great Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Despite of the negatives above, I would still recommend this hotel as the place to stay in Phi Phi simply because of lack of better options. Long beach is nice, but most likely you’ll have to use taxi boats all the time, which is not very convenient. The other side of the island is probably too noisy because of bars and disco.
reviews.title: overpriced hotel and very rude staff members

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Overall, this resort is fine. The rooms are adequate and have nice views, the bathrooms are adequate, the location is good, but what spoiled our stay was the staff. Upon arrival we were informed that they only had single beds for us. We are 3 married couples traveling together and I specifically asked for double beds. We weren't even offered an apology or to move the beds together.
reviews.title: Expensive for an average place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: Their attitude was: "We got your money, now you're on your own". They know that even if you never come back, they'll always be flooded with tourists.
reviews.title: Great location...poor staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: You also have to pay per hour for wi-fi, even though we were offered free wi-fi at all our other hotels.
reviews.title: Grunge on the Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Apart from that, the breakfast at the next door restaurant was wonderful and we had a good stay at Phi Phi. I'm not sure that I would go back, though. Phi Phi can be just as lovely on a day visit.
reviews.title: Great hotel in a secluded location, be aware of high tide though!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great place overall. Location is close enough to the village but far enough away from the noise. Everything was good minus the staff. They could have been a little more accommodating with the services. I asked for luggage storage while I was on a Mr. Local snorkeling excursion (Highly recommended). The puzzled look I got was not inviting. In addition to the fact that there is no late check out to accommodate for being on one of their excursions as well. I asked where the shower was to wash sand off and knowing there was one in the bathroom nearby, they claimed to not have one. I guess once you are checked out of the hotel, they lose all sense of customer service. Even while we were staying, it seemed like our presence as guests in this establishment was an annoyance to the staff. Absolutely unprofessional!
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised, great location and excellent view!
